item.title: Mac Cheatsheet
item.description:
Keboard Shortcuts

Switching tabs:

  • Safari, [shift]+ctrl+tab, cmd+number, shift+cmd+left/right.
  • Chrome, [shift]+ctrl+tab, cmd+number, alt+cmd+left/right.
  • macvim, shift+cmd+{/}.

Editing:

  • Delete to end of line, ctrl+k, same as on command line
  • Delete to beginning of line, cmd+shift+left, then delete
